scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/test-main && npm start" "cd apps/test-remote && npm start arg"
scripts.dev:setup: cd apps/test-main && npm i && cd ../test-remote && npm i && cd ../ && npm run build && npm run dev:link
scripts.dev:link: cd apps/test-main && npm link ../../ && cd ../test-remote && npm link ../../
scripts.dev:buildremote: cd apps/test-remote && export NODE_ENV=development && npx webpack --config microfe.config.js && cp -f dist/myfrontend.js public/myfrontend.js
